install.description: Manage your personal finances wherever you are — even without an internet connection.
install.head: Install the app
install.desc2: Install EconoLink for fast, seamless, and offline access to your financial data.
install.desc3: Quickly access your financial manager, even offline.

offline.text2: This page is not available in offline mode. Please check your internet connection or return to the home page.

HomePage.title: EconoLink - Home
HomePage.about: Welcome to EconoLink, your gateway to economic insights and data.

common.sub-welcome: Manage your finances smarter — securely and efficiently.

RightSide.title: Your finances, simplified.
RightSide.sub-title: Track, save, and grow your money effortlessly with EconoLink.
